overview: Tom Bassett has spent the last 28 years working in finance, accounting and HR roles for a variety of New Hampshire manufacturing companies. Prior to Cadec, Mr. Bassett was the Chief Financial Officer at Laurier, Inc. in Londonderry, NH for 20 years. While at Laurier, he was responsible for finance, HR and IT. Tom holds a Master’s degree in finance and accounting from SNHU, and a Bachelor’s degree from Massachusetts College of Liberal Arts in economics and finance. Tom is currently a Certified Management Accountant candidate, a NH Justice of the Peace and served as a Site Judge for the “Best Companies to Work For in NH” competition in partnership with Business New Hampshire Magazine.
